## Mini Symposium: Applications of R for Bio Data Science in Industry {#sec-symposium}

*This mini symposium on Applications of R for Bio Data Science in Industry aims to give students a glimpse into how modern bio data science is transforming value creation in the pharmaceutical industry and healthcare sector.*

### 2023

#### Companies Represented

- [Clinical Microbiomics](https://clinical-microbiomics.com)
- [Gubra](https://www.gubra.dk)
- [Lundbeck](https://www.lundbeck.com/global)
- [Novo Nordisk](https://www.novonordisk.com)
- [ZS](https://www.zs.com)

#### Speaker List

- [Maria Novosolov](https://www.linkedin.com/in/maria-novosolov/), Data Scientist, Clinical Microbiomics: "Harnessing R Packages for Microbiome Analysis and Reporting"
- [Christina Bligaard Pedersen](https://www.linkedin.com/in/bligaard/), Senior Bioinformatician, ZS: "Plotly and Shiny apps for exploratory analysis of transcriptomics data"
- [Carlotta Porcelli](https://www.linkedin.com/in/carlottap/),  Senior Statistical Programmer, Novo Nordisk: "An ADA monitoring tool developed with Rshiny"
- [Victor A. O. Carmelo](https://www.linkedin.com/in/victor-carmelo-8ab329155/), Principal Bioinformatician, Lundbeck: ""The R in R&D efficiency"
- [Sebastian Tølbøl Thrane](https://www.linkedin.com/in/sebthr/), Senior Scientist, Gubra: "From data analysis to infrastructure: A journey with R"
- [Claus Dethlefsen](https://www.linkedin.com/in/clausdethlefsen/), Statistical Director, Novo Nordisk: "The long and winding road to use R in a pharmaceutical company"
